# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported |
|---------|-----------|
| 0.x (latest) | Yes |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

**Do not use GitHub Issues for security vulnerabilities.**

Please report security issues via email to **info@3x1.io**. Include:

1. Description of the vulnerability
2. Steps to reproduce
3. Affected component (Go backend, MCP plugin, Rust engine, frontend, etc.)
4. Potential impact

We will acknowledge your report within 48 hours and provide an estimated timeline for a fix. Security patches will be released as soon as possible.

## Scope

This policy covers:

- Go backend (`app/`, `cmd/`)
- Plugin runtime (`app/plugins/`)
- MCP plugin (`plugins/mcp/`)
- Rust engine (`engine/`)
- Frontend applications (`resources/`)
- Build system and CI/CD configuration
